name: Sqlite Database Manager
short_description: Sqlite Database Manager by Scott Wickham. This tool allows you to quickly create and update Sqlite 2.0 databases that are built into PHP5 using a simple web based front end. The program is only 9kb zipped, and it will save you many hours of coding time.
